parse: Verb - Present Imperative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To pursue, hence: I persecute. A prolonged form of a primary verb dio; to pursue; by implication, to persecute.
From agapao; love, i.e. Affection or benevolence; specially a love-feast.
A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Verb - Present Imperative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: From zelos; to have warmth of feeling for or against.
Spiritual. From pneuma; non-carnal, i.e. ethereal, or a spirit, or supernatural, regenerate, religious.
More, rather. Neuter of the comparative of the same as malista; more) or rather.
In order that, so that. Probably from the same as the former part of heautou; in order that.

parse: Verb - Present Subjunctive Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: From prophetes; to foretell events, divine, speak under inspiration, exercise the prophetic office.
